00054 #include <assert.h>
00055 #include <stdio.h>
00056 #include <stdint.h>
00057 #include <string.h>
00058 #include <unistd.h>
00059 #include "cparser.h"
00060 #include "cparser_priv.h"
00061 #include "cparser_fsm.h"
00062 #include "cparser_tree.h"
00063 #include "cparser_io.h"
00064 
00068 typedef int (*test_fn_t)(void);
00069 
00076 static void
00077 test_init_parser (cparser_t *parser)
00078 {
00079     cparser_result_t rc;
00080 
00081     memset(parser, 0, sizeof(*parser));
00082     parser->cfg.root = &cparser_root;
00083     parser->cfg.ch_complete = '\t';
00084     parser->cfg.ch_erase = '\b';
00085     parser->cfg.ch_help = '?';
00086     parser->cfg.flags = 0;
00087     cparser_io_config(parser);
00088     strcpy(parser->cfg.prompt, "TEST>> ");
00089     parser->cfg.fd = STDOUT_FILENO;
00090     rc = cparser_init(&parser->cfg, parser);
00091     assert(CPARSER_OK == rc);
00092 }
00093 
00102 static int 
00103 test_input (cparser_t *parser, const char *input)
00104 {
00105     cparser_result_t rc;
00106     int n;
00107 
00108     assert(parser && input);
00109     for (n = 0; n < strlen(input); n++) {
00110         rc = cparser_fsm_input(parser, input[n]);
00111         if (CPARSER_OK != rc) {
00112             printf("ERROR: Fail to input %d-th character.\n", n);
00113             return 0;
00114         }
00115     }
00116     return 1;
00117 }
00118 
00119 int
00120 test_state_transition (const char *input, const cparser_state_t final_state,
00121                        const short token_tos, const cparser_token_t *tokens,
00122                        const short current_pos, const short last_good)
00123 {
00124     cparser_t parser;
00125     int n;
00126 
00127     test_init_parser(&parser);
00128 
00129     if (CPARSER_STATE_WHITESPACE != parser.state) {
00130         return 0;
00131     }
00132     if (!test_input(&parser, input)) {
00133         return 0;
00134     }
00135     if (final_state != parser.state) {
00136         printf("ERROR: Unexpected state. (expected:%d  got:%d)\n",
00137                final_state, parser.state);
00138         return 0;
00139     }
00140     /* Check against expected token stack */
00141     if (token_tos != parser.token_tos) {
00142         printf("ERROR: Unexpected token stack size. (expected:%d  got:%d)\n",
00143                token_tos, parser.token_tos);
00144         return 0;
00145     }
00146     for (n = 0; n <= token_tos; n++) {
00147         if (tokens[n].token_len != parser.tokens[n].token_len) {
00148             printf("ERROR: Token %d length mismatch.\n", n);
00149             return 0;
00150         }
00151         if (tokens[n].begin_ptr != parser.tokens[n].begin_ptr) {
00152             printf("ERROR: Token %d begin pointer mismatch.\n", n);
00153             return 0;
00154         }
00155         if (tokens[n].parent != parser.tokens[n].parent) {
00156             printf("ERROR: Token %d parent pointer mismatch.\n", n);
00157             return 0;
00158         }
00159         if (tokens[n].token_len && 
00160             strcmp(tokens[n].buf, parser.tokens[n].buf)) {
00161             printf("ERROR: Token %d buffer mismatch.\n", n);
00162             return 0;
00163         }
00164     }
00165     if (current_pos != parser.current_pos) {
00166         printf("ERROR: Current position is incorrect (expect:%d  got:%d).\n", 
00167                current_pos, parser.current_pos);
00168         return 0;
00169     }
00170     if (last_good != parser.last_good) {
00171         printf("ERROR: Last good position is incorrect (expect:%d  got:%d).\n", 
00172                last_good, parser.last_good);
00173         return 0;
00174     }
00175     return 1;
00176 }
00177 
00182 static int 
00183 test_whitespace_space_whitespace (void)
00184 {
00185     cparser_token_t token = { -1, 0, "", NULL };
00186     return test_state_transition("     ", CPARSER_STATE_WHITESPACE, 0, 
00187                                  &token, 5, 4);
00188 }
00189 
00194 int
00195 test_whitespace_char_token (void)
00196 {
00197     cparser_token_t token = { 1, 1, "s", NULL };
00198     return test_state_transition(" s", CPARSER_STATE_TOKEN, 0, 
00199                                  &token, 2, 1);
00200 }
00201 
00207 int 
00208 test_token_char_token (void)
00209 {
00210     cparser_token_t token = { 2, 4, "show", NULL };
00211     return test_state_transition("  show", CPARSER_STATE_TOKEN, 0,
00212                                  &token, 6, 5);
00213 }
00214 
00219 int
00220 test_token_space_whitespace (void)
00221 {
00222     cparser_token_t tokens[2] = { { 0, 4, "show", &cparser_root },
00223                                   { -1, 0, "", NULL } };
00224     return test_state_transition("show ", CPARSER_STATE_WHITESPACE, 1, 
00225                                  tokens, 5, 4);
00226 }
00227 
00232 int 
00233 test_whitespace_char_error (void)
00234 {
00235     cparser_token_t token = { -1, 0, "", NULL };
00236     return test_state_transition("z", CPARSER_STATE_ERROR, 0,
00237                                  &token, 1, -1);
00238 }
00239 
00244 int
00245 test_token_char_error (void)
00246 {
00247     cparser_token_t token = { 0, 1, "s", NULL };
00248     return test_state_transition("sz", CPARSER_STATE_ERROR, 0, &token, 2, 0);
00249 }
00250 
00255 int
00256 test_token_space_error (void)
00257 {
00258     cparser_token_t token = { 0, 1, "s", NULL };
00259     return test_state_transition("s ", CPARSER_STATE_ERROR, 0, &token, 2, 0);
00260 }
00261 
00265 int
00266 test_error_space_error (void)
00267 {
00268     cparser_token_t token = { -1, 0, "", NULL };
00269     return test_state_transition("z ", CPARSER_STATE_ERROR, 0, &token, 2, -1);
00270 }
00271 
00275 int 
00276 test_error_char_error (void)
00277 {
00278     cparser_token_t token = { -1, 0, "", NULL };
00279     return test_state_transition("xyz", CPARSER_STATE_ERROR, 0, &token, 3, -1);
00280 }

00285 int 
00286 test_whitespace_erase_whitespace (void)
00287 {
00288     cparser_token_t token = { -1, 0, "", NULL };
00289     return test_state_transition("  \b", CPARSER_STATE_WHITESPACE, 0, &token, 1, 0);
00290 }
00291 
00296 int 
00297 test_whitespace_erase_token (void)
00298 {
00299     cparser_token_t token = { 0, 4, "show", NULL };
00300     return test_state_transition("show \b", CPARSER_STATE_TOKEN, 0, &token, 4, 3);
00301 }
00302 
00307 int
00308 test_token_erase_token (void)
00309 {
00310     cparser_token_t token = { 0, 3, "sho", NULL };
00311     return test_state_transition("show\b", CPARSER_STATE_TOKEN, 0, &token, 3, 2);
00312 }
00313 
00319 int
00320 test_token_erase_whitespace (void)
00321 {
00322     cparser_token_t tokens[2] = { { 0, 4, "show", &cparser_root },
00323                                   { -1, 0, "", NULL } };
00324     return test_state_transition("show e\b", CPARSER_STATE_WHITESPACE, 1, tokens, 5, 4);
00325 }
00326 
00327 int
00328 test_error_erase_error (void)
00329 {
00330     cparser_token_t token = { -1, 0, "", NULL };
00331     return test_state_transition("xyz\b", CPARSER_STATE_ERROR, 0, &token, 2, -1);
00332 }
00333 
00334 int
00335 test_error_erase_whitespace (void)
00336 {
00337     cparser_token_t token1 = { -1, 0, "", NULL };
00338     cparser_token_t token2[2] = { { 0, 4, "show", &cparser_root },
00339                                   { -1, 0, "", NULL } };
00340     if (!test_state_transition("x\b", CPARSER_STATE_WHITESPACE, 0, &token1, 0, -1)) {
00341         return 0;
00342     }
00343     return test_state_transition("show x\b", CPARSER_STATE_WHITESPACE, 1, token2, 5, 4);
00344 }
00345 
00346 int 
00347 test_error_erase_token (void)
00348 {
00349     cparser_token_t token = { 0, 2, "sh", NULL };
00350     return test_state_transition("shx\b", CPARSER_STATE_TOKEN, 0, &token, 2, 1);
00351 }
00352 
00353 int
00354 main (int argc, char *argv[])
00355 {
00356     int n, rc, num_passed = 0, num_failed = 0;
00357     struct {
00358         char      *name;
00359         test_fn_t test_fn;
00360     } testcases[] = {
00361         /* These are the normal transition for accepting a valid command */
00362         { "(WHITESPACE, SPACE) -> WHITESPACE", test_whitespace_space_whitespace },
00363         { "(WHITESPACE, CHAR)  -> TOKEN", test_whitespace_char_token },
00364         { "(TOKEN,      CHAR)  -> TOKEN", test_token_char_token },
00365         { "(TOKEN,      SPACE) -> WHITESPACE", test_token_space_whitespace },
00366 
00367         /* These are transitions that lead to errors */
00368         { "(WHITESPACE, CHAR)  -> ERROR", test_whitespace_char_error },
00369         { "(TOKEN,      CHAR)  -> ERROR", test_token_char_error },
00370         { "(TOKEN,      SPACE) -> ERROR", test_token_space_error },
00371         { "(ERROR,      SPACE) -> ERROR", test_error_space_error },
00372         { "(ERROR,      CHAR)  -> ERROR", test_error_char_error },
00373         
00374         /* These are transitions involved in erase */
00375         { "(WHITESPACE, ERASE) -> WHITESPACE", test_whitespace_erase_whitespace },
00376         { "(WHITESPACE, ERASE) -> TOKEN", test_whitespace_erase_token },
00377         { "(TOKEN,      ERASE) -> TOKEN", test_token_erase_token },
00378         { "(TOKEN,      ERASE) -> WHITESPACE", test_token_erase_whitespace },
00379         { "(ERROR,      ERASE) -> ERROR", test_error_erase_error },
00380         { "(ERROR,      ERASE) -> WHITESPACE", test_error_erase_whitespace },
00381         { "(ERROR,      ERASE) -> TOKEN", test_error_erase_token }
00382     };
00383     for (n = 0; n < (sizeof(testcases)/sizeof(testcases[0])); n++) {
00384         rc = testcases[n].test_fn();
00385         printf("%s: %s\n", rc ? "PASS" : "FAIL", testcases[n].name);
00386         if (rc) {
00387             num_passed++;
00388         } else {
00389             num_failed++;
00390         }
00391     }
00392 
00393     printf("Total=%d  Passed=%d  Failed=%d\n", num_passed + num_failed,
00394            num_passed, num_failed);
00395     return 0;
00396 }
